publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2911 Mr Brian Monteith: Stirling's Successful Bid for City Status-That the Parliament warmly congratulates Stirling on being awarded city status as part of celebrations to mark Her Majesty The Queen's Golden Jubilee, as well as the four other successful applicants from across the UK: Preston, Newport, Lisburn and Newry. Supported by: Mr Keith Harding*

S1M-2911 Mr Brian Monteith: Stirling's Successful Bid for City Status—That the Parliament warmly congratulates Stirling on being awarded city status as part of celebrations to mark Her Majesty The Queen’s Golden Jubilee, as well as the four other successful applicants from across the UK: Preston, Newport, Lisburn and Newry. Supported by: Mr Keith Harding
S1M-2911 Stirling's Successful Bid for City Status (lodged on 14 March 2002) Bill Aitken*
S1M-2911 Stirling's Successful Bid for City Status (lodged on 14 March 2002) Murdo Fraser*, Donald Gorrie*
S1M-2911 Stirling's Successful Bid for City Status (lodged on 14 March 2002) Mary Scanlon*
S1M-2911 Stirling's Successful Bid for City Status (lodged on 14 March 2002) Alex Johnstone*
